name: gone fishing (jamieup)
description:
What's more inconsistent than fishing? Spend a few relaxing minutes playing as cute animals catching fish and inviting their animal friends to fish along. You can catch anything, from boots to sea monsters. Good luck!

Code was written in Godot, art was drawn with Procreate, and music was composed using GarageBand. Everything was made completely from scratch :)

Created by Jamie Ip and William Lin for Bear Jams Fall 2021.

Instructions:

1. Press Space to begin fishing

2. Press Space to keep your bobber in the green zone until the fish is caught!

3. Invite new characters with the mail icon in the top right

4 Rinse and repeat :D
